title: bought 5 keys and crates, didnt get any keys
body: i bought the 5 keys and 5 chests and bonus essence bundle and i got the 5 chests, but I didn't get any keys. I purchased this yesterday and the keys still haven't shown up.

replies.body: I double checked and it looks like you were able to get those 5 chests and keys, then opened all of them. You do currently have 5 more chests left which might be why you were thinking you never got the keys.
i opened one chest and then that was it

We have a relatively new feature that lets you open multiple chests at once. When you thought you were only opening one chest, you actually opened all 5 at once. If you still know that's wrong, hit us up with some screenshots showing us what you're seeing on your end!
